author: crossley
msg: There was not anything wrong with the PDF plugin. The trouble was that the svn update of forrest was slow and clobbering other forrestbot jobs.

author: jdcasey
msg: Fixing the case where there were exceptions in the build, but for whatever reason they didn't trigger a reactor-manager build failure flag...in cases where there isn't really a project against which to log the error, for instance.
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-2142 NullPointerException while using XAConnection/PooledConnection in a heavily contended multithreaded scenario
